com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl

Annotation Type InlineSupport.RequiredField


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
 @Repeatable(value=InlineSupport.RequiredFields.class)
public static @interface InlineSupport.RequiredField
    Used to specify fields for node object inlining in inline methods for the inline target.

    See InlineSupport.InlineTarget for a full usage example.

    Since:
    23.0

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<? extends InlineSupport.InlinableField> value
      Species which field type is expected.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int bits
      Specifies the number of bits needed for state fields.
      int dimensions
      Specifies the compilation final dimensions of the required inlined field.
      Class<?> type
      90 Specifies the the value type for reference required fields.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Class<? extends InlineSupport.InlinableField> value
        Species which field type is expected. See subclasses of InlineSupport.InlinableField.
        Since:
        23.0

      • bits

        public abstract int bits
        Specifies the number of bits needed for state fields. This property only has an effect for InlineSupport.StateField. The number of bits must be between 1 and32.
        Since:
        23.0
        Default:
        0

      • type

        public abstract Class<?> type
        90 Specifies the the value type for reference required fields. This property only has an effect for InlineSupport.ReferenceField.
        Since:
        23.0
        Default:
        com.oracle.truffle.api.dsl.InlineSupport.InlinableField.class

      • dimensions

        public abstract int dimensions
        Specifies the compilation final dimensions of the required inlined field. This property has only an effect with array types and reference fields.
        Since:
        23.0
        Default:
        0
